website_summaries.verdict: This bouncy ball is made from natural rubber and is toxin free.
pros: This ball is about the size of a baseball, measuring slightly less than 3 inches in diameter
It is specifically made for fetch, and performs really well in that game
Good bright color is easy to see
cons: This ball does not hold up to an aggressive chewer
It also doesn't float like other balls

customer_reviews.title: Your item was quality. But our 85 lbs pit ...
customer_reviews.text: Your item was quality. But our 85 lbs pit bull destroyed your ball. He destroys everything. Most "indestructible" toys last an hour. Your ball lasted maybe 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Indestible for my dog; and she chewed it up. When I contacted the seller by email and asked about a replacement ball for her, no one responded. She is an extreme chewer; however they advertise the ball as having a lifetime replacement guarantee. If you look at the photos you can tell how much of the ball she has chewed. I was disappointed that they did not honor their lifetime replacement guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: SJAMS

customer_reviews.title: Well, my dog has had this ball for 30 ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, my dog has had this ball for 30 minutes. There are shards of orange rubber all over my couch. I don't really understand how you can call this "indestructible". Clearly not made for "aggressive chewers".
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two days. Day one I had orange ...
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted two days. Day one I had orange rubber everywhere. I’m constantly picking it up. I have a Cane corso (Italian mastiff) wo just turned a year old and is a powerful chewer, but this ball didn’t stand a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Lasted longer than the rest! That's a plus in my book!
customer_reviews.text: This ball held up longer than any other that I have tried. The Kong toys didn't stand a chance and were usually ripped apart within the first day. This surprisingly made it half a month before seeing damage to the point of taking it away to keep my Pitt from swallowing rubber pieces! Contacted customer service and they were super quick with response and are sending over a replacement! Awesome company in my opinion, and very pleased overall with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed in 20 minutes, not indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: I received my package about 20 minutes ago, and was excited to give it to my dog, aka "Destructo", and 20 minutes later, this is what the indestructible dog ball looks like. I really wish I could find a toy for this power chewer that truly is INDESTRUCTIBLE, and not just advertised that way! How do I initiate the 'money back' guarantee?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely indestructible!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two large pitbulls that like to destroy toys; any toy; within all of 5 mins to an hour tops depending on the toy. I've tried Kong balls, heavy duty stuffed toys, and they all die within the very first week if not day or even hour honestly. These balls (I bought 2, one for each of my pups) have so far lasted beautifully, other than just having some indents/tiny poke holes from their teeth, these balls have stood up to their indestructible name! Would highly recommend them to anyone with big behemoths that like to destroy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ta2dgela

customer_reviews.title: This is not indestructible. There is no replacement path.
customer_reviews.text: Is not indestructible. Damage done to it on first day. I don't think it will last the week. 50 pound lab mix chewed right through it. Does not come with "lifetime replacement guarantee". Came in a plastic bag with a barcode label. No instructions for replacement. Multiple reviewers have said the same thing. Should not be able to say something so bold on Amazon that is that untrue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Indestructible". Ha Ha! Lasted about one week. ...
customer_reviews.text: "Indestructible". Ha Ha! Lasted about one week. I wouldn't even give this 1 star, but I couldn't comment without clicking at least 1 Star. Still waiting to find out about the "Lifetime Guarantee."
customer_reviews.author: Robert F Stockdale IV

customer_reviews.title: A great product and great company!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and the company stands behind it. This ball has lasted longer than any other ball I have got my dog including the kong balls. My dog is half American bulldog and half pit bull and he goes through balls like crazy. This ball lasted the longest and when I emailed them letting them know that my dog finally was able to start to destroy it they sent me a new one right away. I would tell friends and family to buy this and I’m happy I did
customer_reviews.author: k.beck45

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️Indeed INDESTRUCTIBLE ball⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter’s new lab, “Olive”, had destroyed better than a dozen tennis balls, and more play balls from the pet store than we can count. Many family members have “Olive” toys for Christmas. We gave “Olive” this INDESTRUCTIBLE ball. Three days after Christmas, this ball was the only toy that survived! After a month, the INDESTRUCTIBLE ball has only has a few dents. “Olive” has since received other toys, but has tired of them and chooses this ball out of her toy basket, leaving the other toys. You can bet “Olive” will be getting a second UNDESTRUCTIBLE ball for her birthday.😊
customer_reviews.author: 53Pennies

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this product an early review mainly because my dog has had it for three days and it's still in one piece. She annihilates everything I throw at her including ropes and other "dog toys". This thing is made for the dawgs that have the ability to chomp down on an NFL sanctioned football and demolish it in one slight motion of jaw clamp. Now with that being said, when she does tear this up and she will with enough time i will order another one. if this makes it a month, I will update then. So see you here in March with an update
customer_reviews.author: Norberto Lozada Jr.

customer_reviews.title: about time!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!!! someone made a toy that my toy killer cannot destroy. This ball has been chomped, chewed, squashed, tossed, flung, and more abuse. It still looks amazing and shows very little wear and tear. I have tried many many brands of supposed indestructible toys.. and in less than an hour is in bits and pieces, including fire hose toys. My pup loves to tear up toys. He LOVES this ball. He will not go outside without it. On many occasions, he sleeps with it. Thank you for finally creating something he can play with and enjoy and not have to pick up the pieces of it almost as soon as he gets it. Thank you Thank you Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: V.konopacki

customer_reviews.title: This is THE ball!
customer_reviews.text: Had pretty much given up that any ball would last more than a week with my two giants (Great Dane/Pitt Bull rescues) each over 100lbs. Kong extreme become half size in a week. We are now 20 Days in and this ball is still whole. Maybe it is no hole in it that helps compared to Kong's design. Maybe the male (larger) has not spent as long with it, not sure. At this stage, highly recommend. First of any toy, even those that claim to be indestructible, that has lasted this long. Orange is easy to find too. Will try to update in a few more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: mjmd

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, this thing has held up to our 130 lbs male German Shepherd when nearly nothing else has, and he LOVES it! He carries it around the house with him all day long and chews on it constantly. Although he's young, still teething and a very aggressive chewer, he hasn't been able to puncture it or mark it at all in 3 days. This dog destroyed a medium sized Kong in about 5 days so...we're impressed! As far as the value for the money, time will tell if he can ever destroy it or how the warranty process goes should we need it but so far so good! I'd buy again at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Saharri6

customer_reviews.title: Blue heeler approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old blue heeler, Phoebe thinks this is the best ball ever. It's solid with some weight to it, so playing in the house is a little tricky. It's just the right size for her to catch. It is easy to toss a good distance outside for fetch. Orange color makes it easy to locate. Phoebe has been diligently trying to chew it apart for the last hour and has gotten nowhere. A ball that may last more than a week, at last! The only drawback for me is that stuff sticks to the wet ball and doesn't brush off very well. A damp rag takes care of it, just really nasty while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS BRAND!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. Just wow. This ball is AMAZING. my pittie would destroy all other balls and toys I’ve bought her, ropes, level 5 chewers, other indestructible toys, Kong’s, she’s destroyed everything. This ball has so far lasted A MONTH! WOW. WE LOVE THIS BALL!!!!!! Do not hesitate. Your dog WILL NOT destroy this ball over night!!! Ours barely has any marks in it!
customer_reviews.author: mckinze

customer_reviews.title: extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I thought I may have not got the right size for a pitbull . But gave it to him anyways . He chewed and chewed and chewed on it . After 3 months it has 1 tiny dimple from one of his K9s . Can easily wash . Bounces well . I highly recommend and have bought another already , just in case this one gets lost . I plan on purchasing more for gifts
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Really is indestructible
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts, because everything I've bought that says indestructible is ultimately destructible by my goldendoodle. He loves to chew bottles, balls, toys, ropes, all of it. But this ball has been indestructible! He loves chewing it and bringing it to me when I get home from work. And it only has a few dents in it -- it hasn't shredded like other balls do.
customer_reviews.author: Elana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: Great for avid chewers! Really indestructible! Would definitely buy again. My dog has destroyed countless other toys. We have this since May 18, 2018. Today is August 16, 2018. It has some teeth marks (punctures) from where he has incessantly chewed on it and tried to play keep away with us. No pieces missing though. It is used daily. Wonderful product! Highly recommend! I just got another ball, yesterday, August 18th, 2018. The picture shows that ball on the left and the one from May, 2018, on the right. You can see there are only Mark's. No chunks missing. My guy will hold the ball in his mouth and use like a baby would use a teething ring!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M

customer_reviews.title: Oh it is INDESTRUCTIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Hunter is the puppy king of aggressive chewers. This very sturdy toy is still alive & intact when many other toys had to be thrown out b/c they were DESTROYED!!! Or literally eaten. He has chewed, scratched & thrown it about having the absolute best time. I thought the ball would be too heavy for him @ 3months. Nope, he loves it. He can bite it with all he has & toss it about, no damage. I will say that your neighbors might complain if u live in an apartment b/c hefty weight of it makes for loud playtime.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nicole

customer_reviews.title: 50lb Pitbull destroyed this within 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: This toy arrived last night. Gave it to my 50 pound pitbull this morning and she had half the ball torn to shreds within 3 hours. Had to take it away from her before she started swallowing larger chunks and throwing up (the reason we wanted to buy an "indestructible" ball. She is a heavy chewer, for sure, but a regular tennis ball will last her at least a day or so. We have already started refund process.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had this ball falling apart in less than 24 hours! I’ve got little pieces of it everywhere, not to mention the pieces she’s swallowed! I had to take her to the vet because she started coughing up pieces of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Chunks quickly chewed out of INDESTRUCTIBLE BALL
customer_reviews.text: This ball looked very promising. I was pleased with the weight and the size thinking my chewer of a 60lb pitbull wouldn't be able to ruin it very quickly. Sadly, I was wrong. And so I turn to Amazon to ask about the Lifetime Replacement Guarantee. Is it real? Will my ball be replaced? My dog LOVES it and I don't want to take away something she likes to chew, but at the same time I don't really want her to chew and swallow the pieces. Also, the ball lasted only about 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Henry

customer_reviews.title: Quality product! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is great for aggressive chewers like my Laborador Retriever. He has been raised on deer antlers and, therefore, has sharp teeth and a strong jaw. This is one of the only products that I have found that can stand up to the job. The ball is a very firm, but also bounces well. It is great for playing catch with your pet. It cleans off easily, too. I recommend this for any dog owner who has an aggressive chewer. You won't be disapppointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Newsome

customer_reviews.title: So far, ball is indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: Our 1 yr old large mixed dog has managed to destroy every toy and ball I have bought for her. And, I've bought many that claimed to be indestructible. Some took a bit longer to tear up, but this dog remained steadfast and accomplished her mission every time. Not this ball! IT'S AMAZING! REALLY! It bounces high like no other ball I've ever seen. She's played with it for weeks now and no damage. Unbelievable! It may just live up to it's lifetime guarantee!
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great durable toy
customer_reviews.text: I have two aggressive chewers (pit mixes), and I have had this ball for two weeks already and it has stood the test so far. Usually I buy a new toy for them and they last about two days, so I am very happy with this purchase. They enjoy chasing this ball around when I bounce it off the patio and the walls. All it has so far is their teeth indentions, no rips or tears yet. I will stick with this product as it is the only thing I've purchase that has lasted!
customer_reviews.author: Juan De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Not indestructible, but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that my dog destroyed it I still like it. He normally destroys rubber toys in minutes. This one is taking him a bit longer to get through. Though he is still happy with it and that's what matters. So it's not indestructible, that's pretty obvious, but it's not a bad product. It's got a good weight and size, bounces just the right amount, and is generally fun to play with. It's not great, but it's also not terrible. If you don't mind throwing away $16 for your dog to have fun for a couple days then I highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clark

customer_reviews.title: FIVE months so far. She LOVES it.
customer_reviews.text: Grace is an aggressive chewer, making a few day's work of cotton ropes in knots, other chew toys. This is a new favorite. While she has made some dents in it with her teeth, she loves bringing it to one of us to then hold it and see if we can get it away from her, while she growls fiercely (tail wagging wildly). This is hard, solid rubber that she has not been able to shred or chunk. I'll be getting another if/whenever this finally succumbs, but it will be a while!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Update: Product has held up well. Still love it and will buy more just to have them. I love this product! I have 2 Belgian Malinois who are about a year-and-a-half and bought one for each dog. They love it. It fits in their mouth perfect and it's chewable without breaking. They aren't able to shred parts off of the product. I've had it since March 4th and you can see little dimples from their teeth but no breakage. I would highly recommend at this point as my dog shred everything!
customer_reviews.author: stephieinak

customer_reviews.title: All Balls Usually A Scrap By Now
customer_reviews.text: But not this one! Our mastiff mix and our Engish bull terrier have done their best to chase, chew and destroy this ball but it resists. It has a few tooth marks but, really, no ball has lasted this long (a month or two now) as has this one. I don't worry as I have in the past that a day or two after giving a so-called indestructible ball or toy to my guys that I'll find one small scrap of the toy and know the rest is in their stomachs. Bravo to this company for not advertising falsely!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte O. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my pups busy
customer_reviews.text: My 2 German Shepherd love this ball. They are both hearty chewers but what is cool about this thin is it is sort of like a Super Ball. Remember those from the 60’s? Wham-O? Anyway, my 6 month pup will let it go and the ball bounces more then the chuck it balls so he goes blasting after it. Basically has a game of catch with himself. Definitely keep it outside as this thin will take out a window or TV.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cracco

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good weight, bouncy, bright color. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nieces german shepherd as she said he destroys all the toys she buys him. So far after a month he has poked holes in it but he hasn't destroyed it it's still in one piece. Nice a bouncy and good weight for throwing. Bright orange color so easy to find. I'm happy with my purchase. It's nice to have a ball that we can have to play fetch with him that he doesn't destroy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Super bouncy and great company service
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and bounciness. Our lab/mastiff loves to catch balls on the bounce and it’s the best for that of any we’ve tried. Hard and durable. Lasted a few weeks before she finally started tearing it apart. Once she got the first tiny piece out it goes quickly, but still has fantastic bounce, even 1/2 gone. She still loves it, just afraid she might choke on it. She carries it everywhere. Company is fantastic to deal with. True to lifetime guarantee with quick response time. We have replaced two.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: NOT indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through two of these in less than a month. The “lifetime replacement guarantee” is not true. They replaced the first one,but when I reached out to replace the second one, they opted to refund my money. That is nice, but not a lifetime replacement. Kong balls last longer and are usually less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Pepomint

customer_reviews.title: Having a ball
customer_reviews.text: it just depends on the dog.. only one of our 3 really plays with it, she loves it.. she can amuse herself for hours. it's holding up pretty well under duress but does show teeth marks. The other two dogs are only interested in it when she has it, then they are jealous. Thought it was a bit pricey but if it keeps her happy I guess it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: onashelf

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a Bassador (basset hound\Labrador) and is 1.5, we have gone through so many things because he destroys them! rope toys are done in maybe 2 days, the nylabones, he destroys them, anything and everything he can get his teeth on, UNTILL NOW!!! We gave this ball to him for Christmas and it has a couple dents in it 6 days later! It is solid, has good weight for tossing, has some bounce to it, I am soo glad we got it! TOTALLY WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability.
customer_reviews.text: My Brotie is a SUPER DUPER CHEWER. Unfortunately, the ball lasted just a few hours, BUT....the staff at Monster Toys were real SUPER DUPER about offering a refund and making sure that I was satisfied with the outcome. This particular product was not a fit for us, but the customer service sure has me wishing I had a less aggressive chewer, but then, my life would be miserable with out my Brotie. Thanks Guys and Gals. Your 5 star customer service wass top notch!
customer_reviews.author: S.Parramore

customer_reviews.title: Toenie  approves!
customer_reviews.text: Of course it’s not indestructible. What is? However, it’s been the most durable ball I’ve found on the market. I would have bought it again but they truly stand behind their lifetime guarantee. I sent a quick message to the seller about how the warranty works. They just asked for my address and a week later I had a brand new product. I also have other Monster K9 products as well. The ring is incredibly strong as well. I’m not going to disparage other manufacturers by name, but with the quality and great customer service, I’m sticking with these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn T.

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: My dog destroys everything. After 3 weeks of constantly playing with this ball, there are some teeth marks in it, but that is it. I imagine at some point, we'll need to turn it in for a replacement, but what a wonderful warranty and peace of mind! The ball is bouncy, bright and a great size for my 50 lb Goldendoodle! She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good product due to guarentee
customer_reviews.text: Have a 75lb pitbull that is a power chewer. The only toys that he cannot fully destroy are the Kong Extreme toys. Gave this little orange ball a try because of their guarantee. 2 months later, this little ball is still holding up! Overall 3 stars because you can see all the teeth marks where my dog chewed and there are tiny bits missing.
customer_reviews.author: Mindlessslumber

customer_reviews.title: Great Company. They stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2 1/2 year olds favorite toy. She carries it around with her all day. It is soft enough yet very durable to normal chewing. This is a great Ball. This is the only company we buy our dog toys from now. They truly stand behind their products and they are all made from Non-Toxic rubber. This is not true with a lot of companies out there. Some toys have lead and other toxic things in them. Beware of what you give your loving companion to chew on.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Longest lasting ball I've found
customer_reviews.text: It's darn near indestructible... Which means it lasted 2 months before it stated coming apart! That's a lot for our pitty. Worth the $20 considering any other ball he destroys in 2 hours. The first pic is 2 months, the second is nearly 6 months. Update: on our 3rd ball now. The company replaced as promised when the first one died!
customer_reviews.author: KikoMomma

customer_reviews.title: Our Ozzy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our miniature Schnauzer mix loves to chew on things. He's already got an inside 'indestructible' toy but wanted to get him something for outside as he'll just tear a tennis ball apart in a few minutes. This fit the bill. He really likes it. Of course I can't get near enough to it to pick it up and throw and he'll run over and grab it before I can get there. But he's happy and that's all that counts.
customer_reviews.author: Capot

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Watch your toes!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, and my dog loves it! I'll update if it doesn't hold up, but so far it seems like it will be just fine for my 1 year old heeler! Watch your bare feet, as this ball is heavy, and my dog loves to drop it "at"...meaning ON my feet. Haha glad I purchased this one instead of the Kong one that, per reviews, sometimes comes with a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Didn't take long
customer_reviews.text: Ball is a nice size, but it only took into the second day for a small chunk to come out. Not as tough as other chew toys. As others have noted, it's not "Indestructible". Hopefully it lasts a bit longer, but I won't buy another as a replacement. Guess I'll find out about the replacement guarantee...
customer_reviews.author: Grimmace

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about an hour with a 8 month old, 60lbs pitbull puppy. The ball is made out of soft rubber not nearly as hard as a Kong ball, great for not damaging your dogs teeth but didnt last long. The kong ball with the treat hole in the center lasted about 2 months. The photo of the dog is the actual dog that destroyed this ball on the same day.
customer_reviews.author: T140-Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for chewers!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is worth the money. I have a pitbull mix that wad shredding toys and tennis balls in a matter of minutes. She chews on this ball for a good while and barely puts a dent in it. She loves this ball to the point that I have to hide it to get her to stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: Tough, fun & easy care.
customer_reviews.text: We seem to have finally found a ball our tough chewer can't destroy! Bright orange makes it easy to find in shrubbery & high grass. We will also try it in the snow. It rinses off / cleans up easily. Hubby says it's easier to throw than other fetch toys we have tried. Nice bounce and roll. Our Lab could play catch for hours if we'd let her! Update: 9 months later - still going strong & her favorite toy. In addition to playing catch, she carries it around the house. Best purchase we've made!
customer_reviews.author: Marg W E

customer_reviews.title: Finally a durable ball!
customer_reviews.text: We have a one year old boxer mix that has chewed up everything we have given her within 2 days. I mean shredded. This ball has lasted us over a week so far, which to some doesn't seem like a lot but to us it is amazing! There are only teeth marks on the ball, no chunks missing. Finally a ball that can withstand her bite! It was shipped to us rather fast and since it had a warranty I wasn't as nervous to try it out. I will definitely buy this the next time we need one.
customer_reviews.author: Shely

customer_reviews.title: Still have it
customer_reviews.text: Bought nine months ago in a house with 2 Pit Bulls and a mini Aussie. The mini is the real chewer, but everyone has had a shot at the ball. Its SUPER heavy and dense, I almost feel bad throwing it for the mini. The poor ball has really been threw the ringer, but it is still a ball, without ANY chunks removed. Close enough to indestructible for me.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Good for Strong Chewer
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 Labs and a Rotweiller/Australian Shepherd mix. The Rottie has destroyed many of our toys, and we were looking for something "indestructible". Although I know that no dog toy is indestructible, I thought this one would last. We've had it about a week, and so far, it looks as good as new. All 3 dogs have played with it and chewed it, and I don't even see puncture marks. My only negative comment is that the ball is on the heavier side. I can still play fetch with it, but have to make sure that the dogs don't catch it mid-air, as I think that might hurt. But, it bounces well and is softer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: EJB

customer_reviews.title: The ball arrived and is the perfect size but it is extremely heavy
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this ball for my 14 pound Jack Russell terrier who chews on everything. The ball arrived and is the perfect size but it is extremely heavy, way too heavy for her to run around with it in her mouth. So I i'm sending it to my son's 60 pound golden retriever or who certainly will enjoy it. This is a very well-made product and I think large dogs or medium size dogs would enjoy it. As I said the ball is too heavy for small dogs under 20 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible but very heavy
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to find TRULY indestructible dog toys, but this is. It is a bit too heavy for our 10+ lb. Cairn Terrier (as it is meant for larger breed dogs), but he is such an aggressive chewer that we purchased it. Need to roll it, rather than toss it, as its weight makes it destructible to your home's contents! It is his second favorite toy, regardless of its weight!
customer_reviews.author: moldynorthwester

customer_reviews.title: Best indestructible dog ball ever
customer_reviews.text: A little more pliable than a Kong extreme, which the dogs love. And it’s neon orange so I can find it in the yard. The black Kong is likely gone forever—haven’t seen it in months. I will buy this ball over a Kong every time for the rest of my dog’s life and have in fact owned two for many months now—one for each dog!
customer_reviews.author: Motormouth Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: The good news is the quality of the ball is good, it is solid and so far my Doberman has inflicted minimal damage, but the bad news it is like throwing a rock. No bounce just a thud so playing fetch is not an option. Was really hoping to find a toy she could play with that lasts longer than 15 minutes that was fun, sadly this doesn't fit the later.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was on time. So far this ball is ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time. So far this ball is still intact, My dog is an American Staffordshire mix (she has the body and size of an English bulldog,,mixed in with maybe Sharpei and/or Mastiff). She has already destroyed other rubber balls. However, this orange ball seems to be holding up, there are some bite mark indentations but she hasn't been able to tear off any pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Tustin, CA

customer_reviews.title: It's about time!
customer_reviews.text: So far so GREAT! My Boston Terrier Baxter destroys all of his toys within minutes of playing with them. I am on a few days now and not a dent in this ball. I am impressed. Its about time someone made a ball that is really super duty tough! The only thing is the weight of the ball makes it hard to throw around house but that is really not to bothersome for me. If this ball can survives my dog then it can survive anyone's! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Balls sink
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my Rottweiler after a couple of days I could tell ( from the deep holes and cracks that started to appear) that the balls may not last. I will never know for sure because he likes to play in my pond with the balls and they sink like a rock. So when in deeper water were he could not find the both were lost in less than 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: imokay

customer_reviews.title: Best Ball Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a pit bull dog any toys we got her she would have gone in one day. I read some reviews on this ball and OMG!! I am so glad we got it she has played with it like nothing else. it is going on over a month and she still has it. looks like a ball of popcorn but it is still together and she loves it. would recommend this to anyone who has a big dog and goes thru toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very HAPPY Pitbull mom 😀
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball & would buy it again, I have a 9 mo. Pitbull & he loves loves loves to destroy anything & everything he can get his toughing strong teeth on & this is one ball he has not been able to destroy 😂I have two so when he loses one he has the other although it doesn’t take him very long to find the other one 😂 He has had them for over 1& 1/2 months and they are still going strong
customer_reviews.author: Diane Owens

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ball
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball holds up well... we have a large breed dog (Cane Corso) I REALLY WISH this was BIGGER... it hold sup to him chewing on it but he likes for us to throw it.. no problem there unless he catches it mid air... scares me serious choke hazzard... so we only roll it inside now lol... please make this BIGGER AHHHH it's his FAVORITE THING IN THE WORLD. Help a dog Mom out
customer_reviews.author: Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Great ball.
customer_reviews.text: While not totally industrutabile, it has lasted far longer than any other ball my dog has played with. Usually a ball last's about 5-10 minutes. She is still working on destroying this one. While she is not fond of the texture, she still is doing her best to destroy it. And as of 06/06/2018, she is still trying! The ball shows her determination, but it is still a throwable ball and still good for fetch. She is a Pit puppy and very stubborn and very determined! The ball is not going to win!
customer_reviews.author: RamDogTango

customer_reviews.title: Da Ball
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the 2nd one of these same balls, the dog pretty much ate the 1st one I purchased. It did however take her over a month to get through it so I thought I would try again. This 2nd one has lasted a LOT longer and now I"m satisfied, she has only made dimple marks in it which is great by her standards
customer_reviews.author: Kris B

customer_reviews.title: I wtf ed for a minute before lmao at the size smh
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that I was so disappointed when the ball was delivered, first of all the Amazon delivery guy lied, he did NOT hand me the delivery IN HAND, and second, the ball is SMALL!! Its the size of a tennis ball, it is made of solid thick rubber, and he will probably swallow it before he has a chance to destroy it! Please mark the dementions of your product. Had I known how small it was I would have never bought this one. I have a 100+ lb Pitbull and growing, his father was huge means he will be also. I need large LARGE undestructable balls and toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Far it is Indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through many "indestructible" doggie toys for my son's ginormous Golden Retriever, and so far this ball has held up well, and may truly be indestructible. I'm still guessing he'll destroy it at some point, but for now he likes to drop it in the swimming pool and watch it roll to the deep end. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Wero

customer_reviews.title: Nice rubber ball for playing fetch.
customer_reviews.text: A nice hard, yet soft rubber, ball that my dogs can't destroy. It's also a nice size -- not too big and not too small. I have 5 rescues, all big pit mixes of 86 lbs or more who are aggressive chewers. They love to chase this ball and bring it back to us, but they haven't made a dent in it yet. The nice bright color makes it easier to find amidst our heavily planted gardens, and it washes up nicely if it gets mud covered (and in my yard, everything does, including ME!).
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cross

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: We have a Belgian Malinois and he is a heavy chewer. Tears through tennis balls in minutes and we have had a tough time with finding a toy that can last. This one definitely has some marks from him, and sheds little orange pieces.. but it has lasted about a month now and we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Erskine

customer_reviews.title: This is called a bate & switch thing!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this stupid ball it was pictured very large next to a blow up large tennis ball for large dogs! It was a dupe and the ball is tiny like a small tennis ball and I'm not sure how destructible it actually is because I got it for my daughter's dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain Jax, Florida

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this ball
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ball! My dog, Bella, loves to play "fetch," but she "jaws" her tennis balls continuously until she pokes a hole in them. Usually, a tennis ball doesn't last longer than a few days. Enter the Indestructible Dog Ball!. Now, we gets lots of slime, but no holes! And Bella loves her new ball too!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Momma

customer_reviews.title: Very durable for chewers
customer_reviews.text: 3 large German Shepard n on day 3 the ball is still in great condition - 1 of the dogs tends to carry the ball in her mouth constantly chewing on it. Stay turned for another update in a few weeks. About a mth has gone by and the ball held up fantastically! Buying another now just to have a back up as its their favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: rnr

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tear it up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. German Shepherd who destroys everything has yet to demolish those balls. Sent one to my son who has a lab that tears everything up. Both dogs love them. They do not float however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super durable
customer_reviews.text: I have a pitbull who eventually destroys all of his toys. Cotton toys are out of the question, they wouldn’t even last a day. He even eventually destroys his Kong toys, I’ve had this ball for months and even tho it had very obvious teeth puncture marks it shows no signs of breaking. I would recommend this to anyone who needs a super durable ball.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Will only be a great toy for some dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure that this ball makes a great toy for some dogs, but unfortunately my dog (Catahoula/Great Pyrenees Mix) won't touch it. Either it is the weight or the fact that there is no flexibility, I cannot get my dog to play with it. Will be sticking to tennis balls from now on. My daughter's dog (hard chewing Pitt Mix) won't play with it either.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST BALL EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have a shepherd who is a total ball and squeaker destroyer. This ball has lasted weeks, and, in fact he wakes me up in the morning with his loud squeaking-and is proud of it. I highly recommend this ball-and I've tried just about every squeaking ball on the market. It's a great ball, and Amazon's price is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: SMT

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible my eye
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate Lab had the ball destroyed under an hour, bite marks all over, along with bits and pieces scatter throughout the house, not to mention in his stool the next day. This dog is a beast, he has a little Chesapeake in him, and I believe that it is eating his brain, and provokes him in this destructive behavior. I find that only black Kongs, made from commercial grade rubber the only thing he cannot destroy.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome for my dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are indestructible! We were spending about 20 bucks a week on chew toys, that my dog would destroy in about three days! This is his favorite ball!! Highly recommend for dogs that love to chew on things, which is basically all dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cani2006

customer_reviews.title: Lasts more than a few minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I have an American Bully and a Boston-Pit Mix, they go through tennis balls, rubber balls, ropes, pretty much anything - in minutes. They’ve been chewing on this guy for a few days and as you can see, they only have a few teeth imprints on it. I will definitely be getting this again, if they ever get through it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Elich

customer_reviews.title: Great ball for aggressive chewers!
customer_reviews.text: This is our pit-mix willow and her ball. We have NEVER had a ball last more than a day. We’ve had this ball for over a week. She’s barely put it down. It’s a little dimpled but it hasn’t split yet! Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Momstra

customer_reviews.title: Very durable BUT
customer_reviews.text: This ball is the only one my dogs haven't destroyed. It is very bouncy and very strong. BUT I am concerned that when my dogs try to catch this in the air or on an odd bounce it will hurt their teeth. Again very very good ball, I just don't use it any more because my dogs are so active in trying to CATCH it and it may break a tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a 85lb pit who can destroy any ball he has had before now in an hour. Tennis ball in a minute and a half. Three weeks later ball has many, many punctures but is still intact! No pieces have been gnawed off yet. It will happen I am sure but by far the best ball he has ever had. Kinda heavy but expected that. He will even pin it against the ground and gnaw on it like a bone, and even with the punctures it holds up. This ball is a definite winner in my estimation and I will most assuredly buy from you again.
customer_reviews.author: denise brown

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, odd smell.
customer_reviews.text: Its very durable. My lab hasn't chewed through it yet. But she also kept spitting it out. I couldnt figure out why, but when i smelled it, it had a strong chemical smell. I don't know if that is normal or not because this is the first time i tried a "durable" brand other than kong.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Fuller

customer_reviews.title: My dogs go thru balls like they are free
customer_reviews.text: My dogs go thru balls like they are free. Some of them don't even last 10 minutes. BUT this one is the best ball I ever purchased. My pitbulls are not match for this. We have had it 1 week and they have only managed to dent it. I was a loyal customer of Cuz because they lasted at least a week or so before I had to throw them away. I just wish it was a little bigger. Love this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for our power chewer!
customer_reviews.text: Our pit bull/boxer mix really enjoys chewing on this ball. It is one of the only toys she has that she has not destroyed in 2.5 seconds. She has been able to put teeth marks in it, but has not actually broken any pieces off, although she has tried. We still keep an eye on her and only let her chew for a bit every day...if we let her she would chew until her gums were bleeding. This ball has also been great to play fetch with! Overall awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Satterlee

customer_reviews.title: Great ball highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Our pit loves this ball it’s pretty heavy and has held up pretty well to our super chewer. It’s not indestructible but lasts way longer then any “tough” tennis ball. It’s larger then a tennis ball and is not easily lost with its bright orange color. I love that it is smooth makes it harder for our pit to chew up.
customer_reviews.author: Arienne

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 large dogs; both aggressive chewers, but LOVE to play ball. We purchased the first ball in May 2019 and although the ball is chewed and less round shape, it is still around . We are pleased with the ball, particularly since we have 2 dogs that have been using the same ball! For the price I Highly recommend. Cons: customer service seems a bit difficult to reach about their guarantee. Other than that; it seems more durable than most dog toy balls.
customer_reviews.author: Asena

customer_reviews.title: Chew away little one chew away
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My pit bull who is an aggressive chewer hasn't destroyed it yet. So I recommend it to anyone who's dog likes to destroy tennis balls this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Terry B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and only ball that has held up to my German Shepherd. She loves it! We can see periodic punctures in the ball from her canines, but she hasn’t destroyed it like all the others. We have had the ball for approximately 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for throwing as it has a decent weight to it, but more importantly, he didn't chew it up in a day like virtually ALL others that my dog has had. He's had it for several months now and still going strong. If by chance he ever does wear this out, he'll get another one just like it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Indestructable?  No, but the most durable we have found so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have two Doberman mixes who are brutal on dog toys. They will shred a Kong Extreme in moments. We have several Monster K9 toys for them and they have yet to destroy any of them. Some of them have been here for almost a year. Yes, they have damaged the toys, but not destroyed them. They have the stick, the frisbee, and the ball. They have lasted so well that we bought duplicates so that each dog could have one.
customer_reviews.author: Smileypin

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR ROUGH CHEWERS
customer_reviews.text: This ball has been amazing for my dog! He normally chews off the fuzz on tennis balls so we were looking for a way to prevent that. He loves this ball and it hasn't shown any signs of him chewing it. I will say it's very heavy. My dog is 28 pounds and it's almost a little too heavy for him, but its held up to him so no complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson R.

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible but my dogs don't like to fetch
customer_reviews.text: Two large Golden Retrievers that love to play fetch and pretty much demolish a tennis ball in one session. We tried a couple of times with this and after a few trips, the both just quit. I don't think they like not being able to destroy it and it might hurt their teeth a little as they avoid it after a few minutes of playing. Probably great for a really strong-jawed dog like a Shepard or a pit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Truly indestructable
customer_reviews.text: My lawn service ran over this ball with the lawn mower (shame on them), but the ball made it out unscathed! This ball is kindof heavy, it is clearly solid soft plastic/rubber and so it has some weight and my dog prefers soft and squeaky balls (although she consistently destroyed them so we got this one) but she does like this ball. Now she just has to learn to bring it back so we can play fetch instead of keep-away!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I can’t believe it’s still in one piece
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive ball clearly. My labrador couldn’t be happier. She has destroyed tennis balls, racket balls, and a baseball doesn’t stand a chance for longer than three minutes. We’ve had this ball for a month and it appears to still be in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: fanaray

customer_reviews.title: Not Indestructable!
customer_reviews.text: After one month of play with this ball they began to pick pieces off the entire ball which broke off and were ingested. I saw orange pieces in their stools alerting me to remove the toy from them so they could no longer continue to destroy the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Lefeaux

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! This is the second toy that we purchased from this company and our 5 year old Doberman loves it just as much as he loves the tug toy we recently purchased. He’s obsessed with balls and so we are always looking for one that he can’t destroy. We’ve tried all types and he always steals my son’s lacrosse balls and destroys them every time. Since we’ve had this ball he plays with it, walks around with it in his mouth and even sleeps with it. Im guessing he really likes it. Hoping he doesn’t decide to destroy this one too. Hope even more that if he tries to destroy it that he’s unable to.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: not for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: it's barely the size of a standard tennis ball. most people get larger for labs and greater. so as i bought this thinking it was minimally four inches, I was disappointed to find it 2 inches and a serious choking hazard for my mastiff.
customer_reviews.author: Luetta T. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Durability 5 stars, not so much for small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: It's a damn good ball but it states it's for big and small. My dog is 15lbs and destroys rope balls within a couple of hours so this was my godsend toy. However, she could barely get a hold of it, and since it is about the size of a softball, she couldn't keep Ahold of it. When she'd drop it off the couch it would sound like dropping a concrete block. If she were bigger, it would've been the best ball ever. Still giving it 5 stars for durability.
customer_reviews.author: awesomechiver

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST DOG BALL OF ALL TIME!!
customer_reviews.text: MY dog, Guff, a pit bull, has lost several of these balls, hidden many of these balls, and buried two or three of these balls, BUT HE HAS NEVER DESTROYED ONE. This is a history-making ball!
customer_reviews.author: E. Jean Carroll

customer_reviews.title: This ball is so heavy that my Terrier will not play with it.
customer_reviews.text: Industrutable you bet, it so heavy my Terrier will not play with it. You can not bounce it inside as it will break any glass it bounces against. It may be great for large dogs as is to heavy for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Pittillo

product_meta.title: Indestructible Dog Ball - Lifetime Replacement Guarantee! - Tough Strong, 100% Non-Toxic Chew Toy, Natural Rubber Baseball-Sized Bouncy Dog Ball for Aggressive Chewers and Large Dogs
product_meta.description:
Monster K9 Guarantee 

We believe dog toys should be durable and built to last. 

If you buy a toy from us and it doesn't last as long as you think it should (congratulations, you're in the 1%!), we will happily issue you a full, no-questions-asked refund or issue you a one-time replacement at anytime during the life of the product. 

We don't believe you should pay for something if it doesn't work for you, and we're happy to have by far the most generous guarantee in the industry!
feature_bullets: VIRTUALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE - our unique rubber formula is made from the toughest, industrial strength natural rubber; heavy duty shock absorbing design; puncture resistant and virtually indestructible for even the strongest, most aggressive chewers! ★★★ With a LIFETIME REPLACEMENT GUARANTEE, feel free to put it to the test! ★★★
AGGRESSIVE CHEWER APPROVED - this industrial strength natural rubber ball has been tested and approved by German Shepherds, Pitbulls, Mastiffs and many other aggressive chewers
PERFECT SIZE - The size of a baseball (7cm diameter) makes it easy to throw and the perfect size for any medium or large sized dog; if your dog loves fetch or playing ball, this is the toy for them!

100% SAFE & NON-TOXIC - We take great care to make sure our dog toys are made of natural rubber that is 100% safe, non-toxic, and chemical free; and because natural rubber is still "softer" than other hard or plastic toys, there are never any sharp edges for you or your dog to worry about, no matter how much it is chewed
LIFETIME MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE - if you're ever not 100% satisfied, get an instant, no questions asked refund (simply contact us on Amazon on our website)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
